1.label: Enable Switch of Multilevel Sensor Report
1.description: Configure arbitrarily to send which sensor values. the sensor values can be selected from humidity, luminance, and temperature

options.label: Humidity disable, luminance disable, temperature disable
Humidity disable, luminance disable, temperature enable
Humidity disable, luminance enable, temperature disable
Humidity disable, luminance enable, temperature enable
Humidity enable, luminance disable, temperature disable
Humidity enable, luminance disable, temperature enable
Humidity enable, luminance enable, temperature disable
Humidity enable, luminance enable, temperature enable

2.label: Enable Switch of Alarm Notification Report
2.description: Configure to send which the sensor values arbitralily. the sensor values can be selected from human detect and open/close

3.label: Select Switch of Luminance Sensor Scale
3.description: Configure the luminance sensor scale to either percentage value or lux

4.label: Set Interval For Multilevel Sensor
4.description: Configure the sending interval time of the sensor value which is selected by configuration parameter number 1. "0" means especially synchronizing with wake up interval

metadata.inclusion:
Insert a CR123A, and LED blinks. 
Set the controller to the status for “Add”.
Press the button over 3 seconds and release.
About 30 second later, LED turns off when “Add” is completed.
metadata.exclusion:
Set the controller to the status for “Remove”.
Press the button over 3 seconds and release.
LED blinks when “Remove” is completed.
metadata.reset: Press the button over 10 seconds and release
